column2: BRIEF-Dynex Capital Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.74 May 2 (Reuters) - Dynex Capital Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.20 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SAYS “TREASURY AND SWAP RATES ROSE SHARPLY DURING QUARTER FROM IMPROVED GLOBAL GROWTH PROSPECTS” * QTRLY NET INTEREST INCOME $13.6 MILLION VERSUS $14.9 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
